actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th day of May of each year as Memorial Day.

summary.text: Designates the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th day of May of each year as Memorial Day.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th day of May of each year as Memorial Day.
